definition: Qianmen subway station on Beijing Subway Line 2
front door/main entrance/honest and upright approach (as opposed to 後門|后门, back-door or under the counter)
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men
to beat a tiger from the front door, only to have a wolf come in at the back (idiom); fig. facing one problem after another
pinyin: qian2 men2 da3 hu3 , hou4 men2 da3 lang2

definition: to beat a tiger from the front door, only to have a wolf come in at the back (idiom); fig. facing one problem after another
pinyin: qian2 men2 ju4 hu3 , hou4 men2 jin4 lang2

sentences.english: I have an inspector and two officers waiting at the front door .
sentences.chinese: 我已派了一個巡官和兩個警官守候在前門那裏。

sentences.english: The most interesting thing was that there are two red bridal sedan chairs in the front door.
sentences.chinese: 最有趣的是，在前門有兩個紅色的新娘花轎。

sentences.english: Someone was opening the front door with a latchkey.
sentences.chinese: 有人在用門鎖鑰匙開前門。

sentences.english: “We close the front door, and they go through the back door,” he says.
sentences.chinese: Tith說，“我們把前門關了，他們還會走後門。”

sentences.english: Traditional Beijing roast duck is famous all over the world with a hundred years of history.
sentences.chinese: 老北京前門烤鴨名揚四海，至今已有百餘年的歷史。

sentences.english: Street, the original front door in Beijing, in 1979 moved to the Peace Arch Street.
sentences.chinese: 原位於北京前門大街，1979年遷至和平門大街。

sentences.english: Some one was opening the front door with a latchkey.
sentences.chinese: 有人正用鑰匙打開房子的前門。

sentences.english: I said, ‘I kicked in the front door.
Immediately inside the front door was the door of his sitting room.
sentences.chinese: 緊靠前門，裏面的一扇門就是他的起居室的門。

sentences.english: Someone was opening the front door with a latchkey .
sentences.chinese: 這時有人用鑰匙打開了前門。

sentences.english: A woman answered her front door and found two boys holding a list.
sentences.chinese: 一個婦人打開前門，看到兩個男孩手裏拿着一張字條。

sentences.english: It’s on the left side as you go down Qianmen Street.
sentences.chinese: 順着前門大街走，它在左邊。

sentences.english: Claire opened the front door, letting in a cool summery breeze.
sentences.chinese: 克萊爾打開了前門，放進些涼爽的夏日的微風。

sentences.english: I was headed toward the front door when the phone rang.
sentences.chinese: 我正朝前門走去的時候電話鈴響了。

sentences.english: She removed her overshoes at the front door.
They knew better than come to my front door.
sentences.chinese: 他們纔不會呆頭呆腦地找上我的前門來。
